title: Ground News - Nicaragua arrests two high-ranking Catholic priests with close ties to cardinal
text:
Summary by Ground News Nicaraguan police detained two senior Catholic priests on Thursday. The priests are close to the country’s top church leader, a person with knowledge of the matter said. Their arrest brings to at least six the number of priests detained over the past week. The government has not issued any statements explaining the priests’ alleged crimes. Share menu More
